pr_title: Correct order of arguments for ValidatorStatusLogger

timeline.author: mbaxter
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ private void printValidatorStatusesOneByOne(
           Optional.ofNullable(validatorStatuses.get(publicKey));
       maybeValidatorStatus.ifPresentOrElse(
           validatorStatus ->
-              STATUS_LOG.validatorStatus(validatorStatus.name(), publicKey.toAbbreviatedString()),
+              STATUS_LOG.validatorStatus(publicKey.toAbbreviatedString(), validatorStatus.name()),

timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText: Now that I've changed the public key to come first on the other side, this makes sense. Should I change both of them?
replies.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Oh, sorry - I was viewing a filtered changeset, so it looked like we only changed it here.
replies.author: mbaxter
